page.title: 10Westerhope Police Station.
page.content: In Westerhope there is a small police station with about 26 policemen - about 6 to 7 being on each shift. Some policemen walk around Westerhope and three cars patrol the area. The station has no police dogs but they can call for one if required. The police in Westerhope get a variety of different jobs like investigating burglaries, stolen cars, lost children, and road accidents. The bad thing about the job is lots of paper work to do. The hardest thing is to deal with children who are knocked over by cars. The police do not get long holidays; they get 1 weekend a month and twenty days a year.
